mapper.insert: insert into attendances (id, user_id, holiday_id, year, month, day, start_time, end_time, is_entered) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{holidayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEntered,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update attendances set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, holiday_id = #{holidayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, day = #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_entered = #{isEntered,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, holiday_id, year, month, day, start_time, end_time, is_entered from attendances
